title: Choti Bahu â€“ Sindoor Bin Suhagan
overview: The story revolves around Radhika, an orphan who is adopted by Shastriji. When Dev arrives in Vrindavan, he falls in love with Radhika, but his parents fix his marriage with Radhika' sister, Vishaka. However, as fate would have it, Radhika comes to stay with Dev and Vishaka and then starts a love triangle between them.
